name: RES_RPT_CMP_PL_VAL
description: This table displays the values of the components used in the equation of the repeat component.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the result record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the associated repeat result component in the result record. Together with RESULT_ID, this forms the foreign key to the RES_REPEAT_COMP table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values of the pulled repeat component used in equations for a repeat result from the RES_REPEAT_COMP table.

columns.name: REPEAT_PULL_VALUE
columns.description: These are the values of the components used in the equation.
